title: CodeDay
list: CodeLabs is a four week long internship where I worked with a group of 3 to created a multiplayer web game based on the card game Spyfall. We collaborated on the front end using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, and the backend using Node.js and the Google Cloud Platform.
I also designed the logo and 20 playing cards that were used in our web game using Adobe Photoshop.
